paragraphs.body: Outer space is a term used to describe everything existing outside of ${link_0}'s atmosphere. It mostly consists of empty space with clusters of stars, but also solid matter such as comets and ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: Outer space is a term used to describe everything existing outside of Earth's atmosphere. It mostly consists of empty space with clusters of stars, but also solid matter such as comets and meteoroids.

paragraphs.body: The basic observations of ${link_0} have given an understanding of planetary movements as well as the ability to make simple predictions, such as calculating the arrival of comets, forecasting ${link_1}, and distinguishing waxing and waning moons. The positions of various celestial bodies relative to Earth have a significant impact on ${link_2} and spirituality.
paragraphs.text: The basic observations of astronomy have given an understanding of planetary movements as well as the ability to make simple predictions, such as calculating the arrival of comets, forecasting eclipses, and distinguishing waxing and waning moons. The positions of various celestial bodies relative to Earth have a significant impact on bending and spirituality.

paragraphs.body: ${link_0} occurs during a rare planetary alignment.
paragraphs.text: Harmonic Convergence occurs during a rare planetary alignment.
